description:
Squid Girl manages to hypnotize most of the staff of the Lemon. Now she can begin her invading, but one program remains, Chizuru
The Three Stooges and the owner of the Southern Winds Owner have teamed up to issue the ultimate challenge.  This new Squid Girl might prove to be her biggest challenge. 
Squid Girl tries to do evil deeds but they keep backfiring, usually in Chizuru’s face.  Chizuru is going to want some alone time with Squid Girl to… talk.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est de l’hypnose ? / Si l’on collaborait ? / Seules en tête à tête ?
Ist das nicht Hypnose? / Tun wir uns nicht zusammen? / Sind wir nicht einsam?
Saiminjutsu ja Naika!? / Kumanaika!? / Futarikiri ja Naika!?
Squidn`t That Hypnosis?! / Shall We Join Tentacles?! / I Ink We`re Alone Now?!
催眠術じゃなイカ!? / 組まなイカ!? / ふたりきりじゃなイカ!?
